ygData.subject: Rubicite Armor, was  A Request and Thoughts on Rubicite Armor.
ygData.msgSnippet: I looted a rubicite breastplate 2 nights ago. When did you notice it being taken out? Granted we looted 2 claws to begin with, but we still got the rubicite.
ygData.messageBody:
I looted a rubicite breastplate 2 nights ago. When did you notice it being taken out? Granted we looted 2 claws to begin with, but we still got the rubicite.

Oh, and for fun between spawns, duel your party! =) Nothing worse than sitting around staring at that big green ball.
WARNING: Hazardous to your health if spawn is close. Heh, I was dueling the Paladin in our party and the Avatar AND the Ceno spawned. DOH! Paladin wasted LoH (protected) on the cleric due to the duel. Like I said, Duel at your own risk. But hell, it was a lot funner than having to be bored out of our minds. At one time we had 3 separate duels going on.

>From: "Marc L. Allie" <marcallie@...>
>Recently, the spawn on rubicite armor has been messed up.
